closed.description: Indicates whether the project is closed or not.

created_at.description: The date and time when the project was created.

creator.description: Information about the user who created the project.

avatarUrl.description: The URL to the creator's avatar image.

resourcePath.description: The resource path for the creator's profile.

url.description: The URL to the creator's profile.

closed_at.description: The date and time when the project was closed.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the project was last updated.

node_id.description: The node ID of the project.

id.description: The unique identifier of the project.

public.description: Indicates whether the project is public or private.

readme.description: The README content of the project.

short_description.description: A brief description of the project.

template.description: Indicates whether the project is a template or not.

url.description: The URL to access the project.

viewerCanClose.description: Indicates whether the current viewer can close the project.

viewerCanReopen.description: Indicates whether the current viewer can reopen the project.

viewerCanUpdate.description: Indicates whether the current viewer can update the project.

owner_id.description: The ID of the project owner.

repository.description: Information about the repository associated with the project.
